content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello Mister [potential tenant], it's good to see you here. Thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you're interested in renting it, and I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size and location of my apartment, I believe that I can offer you a competitive rental price that will meet both of our needs. Would you like to hear my initial proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to hear the initial proposal, please.

I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Thank you for considering my proposal. Based on market research and my own investment goals, I believe that I can offer you a rental price of €1,500 per month. This price reflects the value of the location and the size of the apartment, while also allowing me to generate a reasonable return on my investment. I believe this is a fair and competitive rental price, and I am open to discussing any potential adjustments or additional terms that you may be interested in. Let me know if you have any questions or if there is anything else we can discuss.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Thank you for your response. I understand that you agree to the rental price of €1,500 per month. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns before we finalize the lease agreement. I am also open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that you may be interested in, such as the length of the lease, any security deposits, or move-in/move-out dates. Once we have agreed on all the terms of the lease, we can proceed with the signing of the lease agreement and move forward with the rental process.
name: Heinrich Heine
